mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, a.id productId, a.productName, a.productNum, a.productType,b.deviceId, b.isSale,a.description,a.imageUrl CASE WHEN b.price IS NULL THEN a.price ELSE b.price END AS price FROM sale_product a LEFT JOIN sale_device_product b ON a.id = b.productId and b.deviceId=#{deviceId}
and a.productName LIKE '%' #{name} '%' and a.productType LIKE '%' #{type} '%' and a.productNum LIKE '%' #{num} '%' and b.isSale = #{sale}

SELECT b.id, c.id productId, c.productName, c.productNum, c.productType, a.id deviceId, b.isSale, c.description, c.imageUrl, b.price FROM sale_device a INNER JOIN sale_device_product b ON a.id = b.deviceId INNER JOIN sale_product c ON b.productId = c.id WHERE b.isSale = 1 AND a.deviceNum = #{deviceNum}
